embeddium.plus.options.clouds.height.des: Alcanza la altura de las nubes.
embeddium.plus.options.culling.entity.de: Activa/Desactiva la distancia maxima de las entidades
embeddium.plus.options.culling.entity.di: Hides and does not tick entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around modded farms.
Hides and does not tick entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves. This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
embeddium.plus.options.culling.tile.dist: Hides block entities beyond this many blocks. Huge performance increase, especially around lots of modded machines.

Hides block entities underneath this many blocks, improving performance above caves (if you have your machines in caves, for some reason). This should ideally be set lower than the horizontal distance.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.mode.des: Controla que tan oscuro se considera Verdadera Oscuridad
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.others.d:
Toggle true darkness in other dimensions

[WARNING] This option will be removed in a near future in favor of a blacklist
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.overworl: Toggle true darkness in the Overworld.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.noskylig: Enables Darkness on no skylight dimensions
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.nether.d: Toggle true darkness in the Nether.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.nether.b: Configure fog brightness in the Nether when darkness is enabled.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.end.desc: Toggle true darkness in the End.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.end.brig: Configure fog brightness in the End when darkness is enabled.
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.blocklig: Disables fog and moon brightness, making blocks as a only source of light
embeddium.plus.options.darkness.moonphas: Toggles MoonPhase light, darkness will be affected depending of moon phase
Configure brightness on a new moon, or minimal bright level on black moon phase
Configure brightness on a full moon, or maximum bright level on black moon phase
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.title: Mostrar FPS
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.desc: Mostrar los FPS. Modo avanzado muestra la cantidad mas baja de FPS, en unos 15 segundos de FPS promedio, util para evaluar el rendimiento.
embeddium.plus.options.displayfps.positi: Espaciado extra del Display de FPS unos cuantos pixeles
embeddium.plus.options.dynlights.tiles.d:
Turning this on will show dynamic lighting on tile entities (furnaces, modded machines, etc).

This can drastically increase the amount of lighting updates, even when you're not holding a torch.
embeddium.plus.options.dynlights.entitie:
Turning this on will show dynamic lighting on entities (dropped items, mobs, etc).

This can drastically increase the amount of lighting updates, even when you're not holding a torch.
embeddium.plus.options.dynlights.speed.d:
Controls how often dynamic lights will update.

Lighting recalculation can be expensive, so slower values will give better performance.
embeddium.plus.options.fadein.title: Calidad del Fade in de Chunks
embeddium.plus.options.fadein.desc: Controla que tan rapido hace fade in. No afecta al rendimiento, Fancy le toma mas tiempo y se ve mejor. Actualmente no funciona
embeddium.plus.options.fastchest.title: Fast Chests
embeddium.plus.options.fastchest.desc:
Disables dynamic chests model and makes it a static model like a normal block, breaks chest animation but goes more faster on chest rooms

Option has no effects with flywheel installed and running batching or instancing backend
embeddium.plus.options.fog.title: Activar Niebla
embeddium.plus.options.fog.desc: Activa/Desactiva la niebla en la superficie
embeddium.plus.options.fontshadow.title: Disable Font Shadow
embeddium.plus.options.fontshadow.desc: Disables Minecraft's font shadows. It looks flat and increases performance depending of the case
embeddium.plus.options.jei.title: Ocultar JEI
embeddium.plus.options.jei.desc: Activa/Desactiva la lista de items del JEI hasta que busques algo. Presiona espacio para buscar lo que sea.
embeddium.plus.options.screen.title: Pantalla completa
embeddium.plus.options.screen.desc:
Windowed - the game will display in a small window.
Borderless - the game will be fullscreened, and locked to your monitor's refresh rate, but allow you to tab out easily.
Fullscreen - the game will display in native fullscreen mode.
